attributes.action: Lower the age to get a drivers license to 15. But the car be restricted etc.
attributes.additional_details: Coz I wanna drive mate innit
attributes.background: Lower the driving age to 15 innit

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640011

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to allow people to get a licence allowing them to drive certain cars from the age of 15, but you'd need to be clear what cars you wanted this licence to entitle holders to drive.
